experience.title: Assistant Project Manager/Estimator
experience.description:
• Championed technology in traditionally tech-poor industry by designing approachable workflows and creating pre-programmed spreadsheets to automate common estimating tasks.
  • Quickly mastered industry concepts and served as interpreter between highly knowledgable senior estimators and customer base.
  • Assisted in sales and management of over $500K worth of construction projects in a single season.

experience.title: Project Coordinator
experience.description:
• Managed and executed web content updates to achieve business objectives.
  • Facilitated technical troubleshooting, including pushing updates to production CSS and HTML.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional partners to create content schedule and manage timelines for creative assets.

experience.title: Project Coordinator
experience.description:
• Managed regular release and testing of over 100 interdependent software products, utilizing issue tracking tools including DevTrack, Trello and Jira.
  • Member of 5-person management team responsible for communication, resourcing and project management for department of 60 software developers.
  • Owned all major Software Development communication, from status reports to company-wide memos and customer-facing collateral.
  • Created and managed customer release note process; collaborated with developers and other subject matter experts to write and revise customer-readable release notes for all changes in subsequent software releases.
  • Executed trainings, represented OSI at career fairs, conducted interviews and managed onboarding of new hires.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description:
• Created print and web collateral for wide distribution, including social media content, custom content for 275,000-member account, and corporate intranet posts.
  • Managed a $1.5M budget for Open Enrollment print materials.
  • Honed project management skills through collaboration with vendors and geographically diverse internal marketing team.

experience.title: Instructor
experience.description:
• Taught advanced technology concepts at age- and skill-appropriate level to students aged 7-17 in various courses on computer programming and video game design. Courses included Adventures in Programming, Adventures in Robotics, Game Creation- Arcade & Platform, and 3D Game Design: Roleplaying Games.
  • Quickly mastered new software and curricula and helped students to troubleshoot projects.
  • Monitored studentsâ€™ progress toward completing individual week-long projects.

experience.title: Editorial Intern
experience.description:
• Developed professional copy editing experience through apprentice-style internship.
  • Supported staff with proofing and editing, including correcting final galley proofs and editing annual report.
  • Delivered written and oral evaluations of manuscript submissions.

education.name: Prime Digital Academy
education.description: Created full-stack applications that dynamically respond to real world business problems utilizing MEAN stack technologies (including MongoDB, Express, AngularJS and NodeJS). Strengthened independent technical research skills and studied best practices in areas including object-oriented programming, test driven development, and version control. Practiced pair programming, group coding, peer mentoring and code review. Engaged with a variety of industry professionals to better understand the typical software development lifecycle.

education.name: Carleton College
